p: Blood samples were collected on days 14 and 28 through the retro-orbital plexus using clean heparinized capillary tubes and dry clean plain tubes and allowed to coagulate. The blood samples were then centrifuged at 4000 revolutions/min (rpm) for 15 min. The serum was collected and stored in the refrigerator at −4°C until the time of analysis. The rats were humanely sacrificed on the 29 th day after the termination of the experiment by cervical dislocation. The livers were quickly excised, rinsed in cold NDNT, and immediately kept in ice to prevent denaturation of biomolecules [ 16].
